column5: There is a metion of Canada fishing in the song.
Why do we have to have just a little John Prine?.. why can't we have a lot???
Gotta love the prine.   "The dogs were barking, the cars were parking, the loan sharks were sharking, the narcs were narking.   Practically everyone was there."
Is it just me?... or does he look like an old neglected, rejected, abused and rejectected Cockatiel these days???
This is good...we got to go now.
whistle and go fishin in the morning ....ive been a fan of prine since he was a postman doing the clubs in chicago...
He had just had lung cancer a couple of years before this.He still has the guitar down pat for sure though.
.. try not to be so wimpy Bubba!
"Fish and whistle"the name of my brothers boat.
This look more like you remember him,Dawg?
Gotta love it. He is one of the greats So many great songs it's hard to pick a favourite. "There's a big ol goofy man dancin with a big ol goofy girl Eww baby, it's a big ol goofy world."

John Prine is one of my all time favourites. I was born and raised on his stuff. I find it amazing how many people have never heard of him, but when you break out the flat top and do one of his tunes around the campfire, it gets everyones attention. The man see's and sings about things most people would never notice, but we've all experienced in some way or another. A true legend in my eyes.  This one is a favourite to me.......    Frig, I think I"m gonna pull out the guitar and have a little jam now  S.
